item.description: author:Ian å½»åº•æ‘†è„±to_dictå’Œfrom_dict # ä½¿ç”¨ pydantic # BaseModelç±»å‹æ”¯æŒ: b = BattleAxiePositionInfo.parse_obj(DICT_DATA) b.json() b.dict() parse_file parse_raw from pydantic import BaseModel class PositionInfo(BaseModel): error: int = -1 # æ”¶é›†é”™è¯¯ none: int = 0 # è¿˜æ²¡å¼€å§‹ clicked: int = 1 # åœ¨client èµ‹æ­¤å€¼ done: int = 2 # åœ¨server èµ‹æ­¤å€¼ xy: List[int] = [0, 0] status: int = 0 # clicked or done or none or error class BattleAxiePositionInfo(BaseModel): our: List[PositionInfo] = [PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo()] enemy: List[PositionInfo] = [PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo(), PositionInfo()] pp = BattleAxiePositionInfo() print(f"pp json: {pp.
